definition: (to do sth) separately/as a separate action
other/another/separate/separately

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
to notify at a different time/to notify later/to give prior notice

sentences.english: The specific measures for rewarding shall be separately formulated by the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 具体奖励办法由中国保监会另行制定。

sentences.english: You and your friend are off the job until further notice.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的朋友被停职了，除非另行通知。

sentences.english: Refer to the Performance Evaluation Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 参照公司另行制定的绩效考核表。

sentences.english: Regulations on education in religious schools shall be formulated by the State Council separately.
sentences.chinese: 宗教学校教育由国务院另行规定。

sentences.english: Specific procedures for charging litigation fees shall be prescribed separately.
sentences.chinese: 收取诉讼费用的具体办法另行规定。

sentences.english: You do not need to download an extra language pack.
sentences.chinese: 您不需要另行下载其他语言包。

sentences.english: Anything unstated herein shall be subject to a supplementary agreement entered into both Parties.
sentences.chinese: 未尽事宜，由甲乙双方另行签订补充协议予以约定。

sentences.english: The Catalogue of Encouraged Industries in the Western Region shall be issued separately.
sentences.chinese: 《西部地区鼓励类产业目录》另行发布。

sentences.english: If not separate can issue to resolve.
sentences.chinese: 若有未尽事宜另行协商解决。

sentences.english: Students and families will be notified if there are any changes to the above calendar.
sentences.chinese: 以上行事历如有任何更改，学校将另行通知。

sentences.english: Parliamentary elections are scheduled separately for 2010.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗的议会选举将另行于2010年举行。

sentences.english: The people's court shall form a new collegial panel for the purpose of the retrial.
sentences.chinese: 人民法院审理再审案件，应当另行组成合议庭。

sentences.english: Information in this list is subject to change without further notice.
sentences.chinese: 在此列表中的信息如有变更，恕不另行通知。

sentences.english: Colloidal gold double labeled immunocytochemistry was done in 8 patients.
sentences.chinese: 其中8例另行胶体金标记免疫电镜观察。

sentences.english: The specific categories and tax items shall be promulgated separately.
sentences.chinese: 具体品种及税目另行公布。

sentences.english: When necessary, the Audit Committee shall have another meeting with the external auditors ( non-attendance of the management level).
sentences.chinese: 审核委员会于有需要时会与外聘核数师另行开会。

definition: to withhold/to refuse
voluntary/autonomous/by oneself/self-
according to/in light of
matters/arrangements
to use discretion/to take circumstances into account/to make allowances pertinent to a situation
to give/to impose/to apply
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to lump together/to treat along with all the others
variant of 一併|一并, to lump together/to treat along with all the others
to notify at a different time/to notify later/to give prior notice
according to regulation
to allow/to grant/to permit
to precede others/in advance
to pay (taxes or dues)
to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
to draw up/to draft/to formulate
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
